titleInfo.title: Letter from Henry Meriton, Superintendent, to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter relates to Bruce's salary as Resident in the Gulf. Meriton states that the Governor in Council sees no reason for altering the deception of the late Governor on Bruce's claim for the allowance of Lieutenant in Command for the period 31 May 1805 to 1 May 1819.
